name: Nuxt-SSR-Firebase
description: Host Nuxt.js SSR app on Firebase Cloud Functions with Firebase Dynamic Hosting.
author: David Royer

scripts.build: npm run build:nuxt && npm run clean && npm run copyassets
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run setup:client && npm run setup:firebase && npm run setup:server
scripts.copyassets: npm run copydist && npm run copystatic
